description:
What is your capacity? Does your backend scale? Are you on the edge of an outage? Find out with locust.io, a Python based load testing tool. Locust.io is open source, battle-tested, extensible and can help you sleep better at night ahead of a big product release.

/redirect?q=https%3A%2F%2F2017.es.pycon.org%2Fen%2Fschedule%2Fload-test-your-backend-with-locustio%2F&v=cuATUqwW6T8&event=video_description&redir_token=g-CRDrHezalB7To9kQyEb7DM_Tl8MTUwNzQ0Mzk4MEAxNTA3MzU3NTgw
title: Load test your backend with locust.io
